system.availability:
Improves any Exceptional Craftsmanship Cybernetic, increasing the bonus the bionic provides by +10 (EG: Bionic arms provide +20 to dextrious movements and strength instead of +10).
If a bionic does not provide a bonus, it now provides +10 to Characteristic Tests that directly relate to its use. (GM Discretion).
system.cost: Iron Hands Chapter and Deathwatch Forgemasters only.
